Test 2: Multiple Choice.question: What is the primary characteristic of a Data Mart?
choices: It is a replica of the entire enterprise database.
It focuses on real-time transaction processing.
It is a subject-oriented subset of a data warehouse.
It is a complex, unaggregated data lake.

Test 2: Multiple Choice.question: Which of the following is a key advantage of using a Data Mart?
choices: It guarantees perfect data consistency across the entire organization.
It has a broader scope than a full Data Warehouse.
It provides faster query performance for targeted business needs.
It is the final destination for all operational data.

All data points in the cube.
